thread.title: Coming Distractions: Alien: Covenant prologue features the last happy day for some doomed colonists
thread.title_full: Coming Distractions: Alien: Covenant prologue features the last happy day for some doomed colonists

author: Sam Barsanti
title: Coming Distractions: Alien: Covenant prologue features the last happy day for some doomed colonists
text:
Share Tweet 
Taken on its own, this new Alien: Covenant clip might be the happiest four minutes in the history of the decades-long Alien series—and that’s including the part where the woman begins to choke. Titled “Last Supper,” the clip features the film’s surely doomed cast of characters sharing one last James Franco-less meal before entering cryosleep and embarking on what will definitely be a horrifying journey full of grotesque creatures and unsettling androids (at least if the first trailer is anything to go by). Also, if you’re looking for another glimpse of these folks enjoying themselves before being killed by monsters, the Alien Twitter account shared a photo of the whole crew yesterday. 
Alien: Covenant was directed by Ridley Scott and it stars Michael Fassbender, Katherine Waterston, Billy Crudup, and Danny McBride. It’ll be in theaters on May 19.
